2D is different from 3D, for everyone who is asking why people love NTR. To all the delusional people out there bashing Jin, you should not mix fiction with reality. Each artist has their own unique way to characterize their drawings, but they're not simply how the artist would portray themselves. A lot of artist aren't satisfied drawing boring stuff anymore, they like to experiment with new ideas to make things interesting.
